Articles.Content:
Does it work? If so how please?As a test I built a 2 node mission, start node/spawn vehicle node connected to a “Recover Kerbal” node with the catch al checked box checked. I spawn a Mk1 in orbit with a Kerbal inside. The screen loads and instantly the Mission success end message window pops up. 

This seems to be the source of my Mission Builder DLC unpleasantness experience. Whenever I recover a Kerbal or craft, with a Kerbal inside, in a stock or community published Mission. Kerbal Space Program freezes.
